steps.title: What is Position?
steps.message: Your seat at the table matters. It determines when you act each round — and that impacts strategy.

steps.title: Early vs Late
steps.message: Early Position = acts first (worst). Late Position = acts last (best). Button = best seat.

steps.title: Why It Matters
steps.message: Being in late position gives you more info on your opponents. It’s one of the most powerful advantages in poker.
